title: Full-Stack Developer // Systems Admin
description: Created the front-end web-app & complete back-end infrastructure on Amazon Web Services (AWS) for 867Crypto, a slot machine game with cryptocurrency prizes with over 15,000 active users.
technologies: React.js, Docker, AWS (EC2, Lightsail, RDS, and S3), Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, TailwindCSS, Flask, Python, Node.js, GitHub CI/CD, Atlassian
